name: Plug-In
description:
"Plug-In" as the name suggests is a game where you'll have to plug the socket. A 3D labyrinth game made for the Side Quest#2 Game Jam. It's good to mention that the game is extremely short too.

Controls:

W-Up

A-Left

S-Down

D-Right

Q-Move the plug away from the camera

E-Move the plug towards the camera

"1" and "2" will let you swap between cameras.

Keep in mind that the controls will always follow these rules no matter the camera angle.

Background Music:

Menu's song - The Elevator Bossa Nova by Benjamin Tissot - available at:  https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/the-elevator-bossa-nova

In-Game Song -Chill Gaming by David Fesliyan - available at:

https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/chill-gaming/350

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dgbczWlyukU

Well, have fun! 0/
